thread.title: Please refer back to this photo whenever anyone at CNN talks about ‘Fake News’ #CowInQueens
thread.title_full: Please refer back to this photo whenever anyone at CNN talks about ‘Fake News’ #CowInQueens

author: Greg P.
title: Please refer back to this photo whenever anyone at CNN talks about ‘Fake News’ #CowInQueens
text:
Will people at the other networks fess up? Same here in KC at @fox4kc https://t.co/daxWzV7i8x 
— Nick Vasos (@NickVasos) February 21, 2017 I'm watching a police standoff with a cow on the loose in Queens pic.twitter.com/HHDTnr8tyZ 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 21, 2017 
And it’s the entire industry, isn’t it? I watched Anchor Man 2 the other day, and once you get past that it's a terrible movie, the core premise is incredibly spot on https://t.co/EuvyxxSNLd 
— Leigh Drogen (@LDrogen) February 21, 2017 
The cow was eventually captured and will be reportedly moved to a cow sanctuary, whatever that is: Good news update: @ABC7NY reports that the cow/bull will LIVE at a nearby animal sanctuary. 
— Steve Kopack (@SteveKopack) February 21, 2017 
***
